summary: "The Dukes of Hazzard" is an American TV show about cousins Bo and Luke Duke, who live in Georgia and are on probation for making illegal alcohol. They outsmart the corrupt sheriff and rich city people with clever plans and their trusty car, the General Lee. Their cousin Daisy and uncle Jesse help them from their home in the woods. The show was very popular in the late 1970s and early 1980s. It was based on a movie from 1975 and later made into a film in 2005.
title: The Dukes of Hazzard
